00001 !==============================================================================!
00002 ! MODULE: tally 
00003 !
00008 
00009 module tally
00010 
00011   implicit none
00012   private
00013   public :: setup_tallies,add_to_tally,bank_tally
00014 
00015   type, public :: tally_type
00016 
00017     real(8), allocatable :: E(:)      ! user defined energy structure
00018     real(8), allocatable :: val(:)    ! the temporary value
00019     real(8), allocatable :: sum(:)    ! the sum for the mean and var
00020     real(8), allocatable :: sum_sq(:) ! the sum for the variable
00021     logical :: flux_tally             ! is this the flux tally
00022     integer :: nbins                  ! number of tally regions
00023     real(8) :: width                  ! the uniform width
00024     real(8) :: emax                   ! max e
00025     real(8) :: emin                   ! min e
00026 
00027   end type tally_type
00028 
00029 contains
00030 
00031 !===============================================================================
00032 ! SETUP_TALLIES
00035 
00036   subroutine setup_tallies(this,n,emax,emin)
00037 
00038     ! formal variables
00039     integer          :: n       ! number of tally arrays
00040     type(tally_type) :: this(n) ! array of tallies
00041     real(8)          :: emax    ! max e
00042     real(8)          :: emin    ! min e
00043 
00044     ! set up automatic flux tally
00045     this(1)%flux_tally = .true.
00046     this(1)%nbins = 1000
00047     this(1)%emax = emax
00048     this(1)%emin = emin
00049     this(1)%width = (log10(emax) - log10(emin))/dble(this(1)%nbins)
00050 
00051     ! preallocate vectors
00052     if(.not.allocated(this(1)%val)) allocate(this(1)%val(1000)) 
00053     if(.not.allocated(this(1)%sum)) allocate(this(1)%sum(1000))
00054     if(.not.allocated(this(1)%sum_sq)) allocate(this(1)%sum_sq(1000)) 
00055 
00056     ! zero out tallies
00057     this(1)%val = 0.0_8
00058     this(1)%sum = 0.0_8
00059     this(1)%sum_sq = 0.0_8
00060 
00061   end subroutine setup_tallies
00062 
00063 !===============================================================================
00064 ! ADD_TO_TALLY
00067 
00068   subroutine add_to_tally(this,n,totxs,E)
00069 
00070     ! formal variables
00071     integer          :: n        ! size of tallies
00072     type(tally_type) :: this(n)  ! array of tallies
00073     real(8)          :: totxs    ! totalxs
00074     real(8)          :: E        ! neutron energy
00075 
00076     ! local variables
00077     integer :: i    ! iteration counter
00078     integer :: idx  ! index in tally grid
00079 
00080     ! begin loop over tallies
00081     do i = 1,n
00082 
00083       ! use uniform grid sampling if flux tally
00084       if (this(i)%flux_tally) then
00085 
00086         ! calculate index
00087         idx = ceiling((log10(E) - log10(this(i)%emin))/this(i)%width)
00088 
00089       else
00090         write(*,*) 'Something is wrong right now'
00091         stop
00092       end if
00093 
00094       ! add to tally
00095       this(i)%val(idx) = this(i)%val(idx) + 1.0_8/totxs
00096 
00097     end do
00098 
00099   end subroutine add_to_tally
00100 
00101 !===============================================================================
00102 ! BANK_TALLY
00105 
00106   subroutine bank_tally(this,n)
00107 
00108     ! formal variables
00109     integer          :: n       ! size of tallies
00110     type(tally_type) :: this(n) ! array of tallies 
00111 
00112     ! local variables
00113     integer :: i    ! iteration counter
00114 
00115     ! begin loop over tallies
00116     do i = 1,n
00117 
00118       ! record to sums
00119       this(i)%sum    = this(i)%sum    + this(i)%val
00120       this(i)%sum_sq = this(i)%sum_sq + this(i)%val**2
00121 
00122     end do
00123 
00124  end subroutine bank_tally
00125 
00126 end module tally
